'''Patton Peter Oswalt''' (born January 27, 1969)<ref>[https://web.archive.org/web/20180315074113/https://www.biography.com/people/patton-oswalt-062716 Patton Oswalt - Actor, Comedian - Biography]</ref> is an American stand-up comedian and actor. He is best known for his roles in media such as {{w|Ratatouille (film)|Ratatouille}}, {{w|Bojack Horseman}}, {{w|22 Jump Street}}. As a stand-up comedian, Oswalt has appeared in six stand-up specials. He has won two Emmy Awards, one Grammy Award, and various miscellaneous awards for his acting and stand-up comedy work.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
Oswalt voices the male variant of {{MCSM|Jesse}} in ''[[Minecraft: Story Mode]]'' and ''[[Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two]]''.<ref>[https://www.behindthevoiceactors.com/Patton-Oswalt/ Patton Oswalt (visual voice guide) - Behind The Voice Actors]</ref>
